text: Nicole Jaffe David (born May 23, 1941) is a Canadian talent agent and former actress. She is best known as the original voice for Velma Dinkley in Hanna- Barbera's Scooby-Doo, Where Are You! Saturday morning cartoon series from 1969 to 1970. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Montreal
title: Nicole Jaffe
